      Methods in dkeep.logic that return Character

      Character Level.getFirstEnemie()
      Gets the 1st enemy from the enemies' ArrayList - used mainly to get the Guard in the 1st Level
      Methods in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Ogre.verifyColision(Character c)
      Compares if an ogre and the club attack is next to another Character and updates the ogre accordingly Checks if the Ogre is not stunned and then compares if the Character c is next to it , if so the the ogre is set to stunned accordingly Also checks if the character is next to the ogre attack club
      boolean DrunkenGuard.verifyColision(Character c) 
      boolean Character.verifyColision(Character c)
      Verifies if a character is next to another (in an adjacent position, diagonal is not verified) or in the same position
      boolean Map.verifyMoveDoors(Character c)
      Function that checks if a character is trying to go through a door and if he is able to
      Method parameters in dkeep.logic with type arguments of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Hero.update(Map currentmap, char move, java.util.ArrayList<Character> enemies)
      Updates the Hero status and movement in the game by checking colisions with the enemies of the level, with the key and the door
